channel.title: Pages on Manas Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Manas Gupta

item.title: about
item.description:
My name is Manas Gupta. I am a software engineer helping with Technical Operations at the Yahoo Mail Contacts team in the Bay Area.

When I am not spending time with my wife and two wonderful daughters, you can find me reading plot summaries for movies/tv-shows. I do read technical books without waiting for the spoilers.

I have lived in a lot of places, but Montreal (Canada) can be considered home base.

Need to reach me? hello@manasg.com or twitter
